{{ModID}}_CottonsBundle.ShopEvent: XOR/-1000 -1000/farmer 7 7 0 FC.Cotton -3000 -3000 2/pause 1000/viewport 10 9 clamp true/addConversationTopic FC.CottonsFreedom 7/pause 1000/warp FC.Cotton 10 6/move FC.Cotton -2 0 3/pause 1000/faceDirection FC.Cotton 2/speak FC.Cotton "You...You freed me.$2"/pause 400/speak FC.Cotton "I don't know what your angle is...$2"/move FC.Cotton -1 0 2/pause 200/pause 300/speak FC.Cotton "But thank you, I've been stuck in there for years...$2"/pause 300/speak FC.Cotton "But this doesn't mean I owe you anything, it's humans who put me behind those falls in the first place.$5#$b#And I'm pretty sure you're human...$2#$b#I think, I don't remember what humans look like anymore.#$b#No matter, I'll never be captured again.$5#$b#I'd rather die and anyone who tries to trap me, they're going down with me!$5"/pause 600 true/viewport move 1 -1 6000000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end warpOut
